summary: The son of Torren learns of his heritage, goes to avenge the deaths of his fellow villagers, and rescue his sister from the evil Dakkar and his spider cult.
cast: Miles O'Keeffe|Sabrina Siani|Ritza Brown|Edmund Purdom|Dakar|Laura Gemser|Alessandra Vazzoler|Nello Pazzafini|Jean Lopez|Olivia Goods|Bruno Bilotta|Ron Carter|Brooke Hart|Warren Hillman
title: Ator el poderoso
